pageContext.claim: “The Democrats & Shifty Schiff, whose presentation to the Senate was loaded with lies and misrepresentations, are refusing to state that the Obama Administration withheld aid from many countries including Ukraine, Pakistan, Philippines, Egypt, Honduras, & Mexico. Witch Hunt!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is comparing apples and oranges here. The Obama administration withheld aid because of human rights abuses and brutal crackdowns on political opponents. The Government Accountability Office — a non-partisan watchdog — found that aid to Ukraine was withheld “for a policy reason, which is not permitted under the Impoundment Control Act (ICA).” In other words, the move was illegal.
